name: Pastel DeviantArt 3.0
description:
Transforms DeviantArt's usual green into a cute pastel blue, pink or purple theme.

--kokotea

user.name: kokotea
user.about: Name's koko. Occasionally coding some stuff.

css:
@-moz-document domain("deviantart.com") {/*
  ╭╮╱╱╱╱╭╮╱╱╱╱╭╮
  ┃┃╱╱╱╱┃┃╱╱╱╭╯╰╮            
  ┃┃╭┳━━┫┃╭┳━┻╮╭╋━━┳━━╮
  ┃╰╯┫╭╮┃╰╯┫╭╮┃┃┃┃━┫╭╮┃
  ┃╭╮┫╰╯┃╭╮┫╰╯┃╰┫┃━┫╭╮┃
  ╰╯╰┻━━┻╯╰┻━━┻━┻━━┻╯╰╯
♥ Pastel deviantArt coded by kokotea.deviantart.com
♥ background from cocorini.com

♥ donations are very appreciated (laughs) */

/*theme colors*/
/*[[themecolor]]*/



/*background options*/
body, #output, .bubbleview, .discoverytag_container, div.messages, div.mczone, .mods-hh, div.modal div.light,
.deepee-box .deepee-sidebar, #deviant .gruze-main, .dev-page-container, .dev-page-view.view-mode-full .dev-view-deviation, .dev-page-view.view-mode-full_zoomed .dev-view-deviation, body.chatroom div.bubbleview, .alt0  , html>body #lub div.collections, .dev-page-view.view-mode-full .dev-view-deviation, .dev-page-view.view-mode-full_zoomed .dev-view-deviation, #notes td.notes-left, #notes td.notes-right, .mypoints-transfer-form .giveModal, .giveModal, .dev-page-view.view-mode-full .dev-view-deviation, .dev-page-view.view-mode-full_zoomed .dev-view-deviation{/*[[background]]*/}

/*text color options*/

}
